name: Artifacts, Ginsberg and Symposium Artgamez Bundle
name_original: Artifacts, Ginsberg and Symposium Artgamez Bundle
description:
This is a package of 3 mini-Art games: Artifacts, Ginsberg, and Symposium

These were all created by me the past couple of month, each game took about 2-4 weeks to create and was built to be both art piece and learning experience.

  • Artifacts: a interactive installation about Internet Archaeology
  • Ginsberg: beat the clock, collection game about the poet Allen Ginsberg
  • Symposium: Interactvie installation, a modern interpretation of Plato's Symposium and Diotima's account of Love/Eros.

Two Players:
To use two player mode please connect 2 X-box or PC controllers.

Thank you for playing!
